subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Randy Robitaille scored the only goal of a shootout to lead the Islanders to a come-from-behind 3-2 victory against the Toronto Maple Leafs Thursday night at Nassau Coliseum.
snippet: Randy Robitaille scored the only goal of a shootout to lead the Islanders to a come-from-behind 3-2 victory against the Toronto Maple Leafs Thursday night at Nassau Coliseum.
